message.name: ERR_CASEEVIDENCETREE_CANCEL_FV_STATUSCODE_INVALID
message.locale: Only evidence trees with a status of 'Active' or 'In Edit' can be canceled.
Only evidence trees with a status of 'Active' or 'In Edit' can be cancelled.

message.name: ERR_CASEEVIDENCETREE_ACTIVATE_FV_STATUSCODE_INVALID
message.locale: Only evidence trees with a status of 'In Edit' or 'Suspended' can be activated.

message.name: ERR_CASEEVIDENCETREE_INSERT_XRV_EFFECTIVE_BEFORE_CASE_START_DATE
message.locale: An evidence tree can only be effective after the case start date.

message.name: ERR_CASEEVIDENCE_TREE_RV_INEDIT_TREE_EXISTS_ON_DATE
message.locale: An editable tree exists already on the specified effective date.

message.name: CASE_EVIDENCE_TREE_SUSPENSION_FV_REASON_EMPTY
message.locale: A reason for suspending the evidence must be specified.

message.name: CASE_EVIDENCE_TREE_SUSPENSION_FV_STATUSCODE_INVALID
message.locale: Only evidence trees with a status of 'Active' can be suspended.
